TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DeleteChildAccessRule extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule
Public NotInheritable Class DeleteChildAccessRule Inherits ActiveDirectoryAccessRule

summary.span: 类表示一种特定类型的访问规则，该规则用于允许或拒绝某个 Active Directory 域服务对象删除子对象的权限。

span.span: The class represents a specific type of access rule that is used to allow or deny an Active Directory Domain Services object the right to delete child objects.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public DeleteChildAccessRule (System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identity, System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType type);

span.span: An object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.

param.name: type
param.span: 指定访问规则类型的 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.

summary.span: 使用指定的标识引用和访问控制类型来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified identity reference and access control type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用此构造函数，它会创建适用于所有子类型删除子访问规则。If you use this constructor, it creates a delete child access rule that applies to all child types.
